chunks.title: Send Tokens - Complete Guide
chunks.body: Simple guide for sending tokens using NYLAGo's 5-step process. When users ask 'How do I send tokens?' guide them through: Send tab → Username → Amount & token → Blockchain → 'Send to X.com'.
chunks.summary_en: Send tokens in 5 steps: Go to Send tab, input recipient X username, enter amount and token, select blockchain, click 'Send to X.com'.
chunks.summary_zh: 5步发送代币：前往发送选项卡，输入收件人X用户名，输入金额和代币，选择区块链，点击'发送到X.com'。

steps.details: Open NYLAGo (browser extension or https://sonyschan.github.io/nyla-go/) and click on the Send tab.
Enter the recipient's X.com username WITHOUT the @ symbol. For example, enter 'alice' not '@alice'.

steps.action: Enter the amount and the token you want to transfer
steps.details: Type the amount and select the token type (SOL, ETH, ALGO, etc.) from the dropdown.
Choose the blockchain that matches your token (SOL=Solana, ETH=Ethereum, ALGO=Algorand).
Click 'Send to X.com' to generate and automatically post your transfer command. NYLA will execute it within 30-60 seconds.

common_questions.question: How do I send tokens?
common_questions.answer: Use NYLAGo's Send tab to enter recipient username, amount, and network, then post the generated command on X.com.

common_questions.question: How to send cryptocurrency?
common_questions.answer: NYLAGo makes it easy: open Send tab, enter details, generate command, post on X.com for NYLA to execute.

common_questions.question: Transfer tokens step by step
common_questions.answer: 1) Open NYLAGo 2) Send tab 3) Enter username 4) Choose amount/token 5) Select network 6) Generate command 7) Post on X.com 8) Wait for confirmation.

common_questions.question: How do I transfer crypto?
common_questions.answer: Use NYLAGo interface to create transfer commands that NYLA executes when you post them on X.com.

pitfalls.solution: Always match network to token type. SOL=Solana, ETH=Ethereum, ALGO=Algorand.
Copy and paste command exactly as generated. Do not modify the text.

success_indicators: NYLA replies to your X.com post
